title: Pixel 2 has no LTE on home network (Digicel Trinidad and Tobago)
content:
I had to give up my Pixel 2 because it was unable to access LTE services on my home network.

Network: Digicel
Country: Trinidad and Tobago

I getting LTE on other devices such as OnePlus 5 and Essential PH-1.

I gave up my Pixel 2 last year, is there any way to check if the issue was resolved? Because I just want to move back to a Pixel device.
